name: Wasted Space (Happy4488)
description:
Wasted space is a game made in three days for the Ludum Dare 40. You are the pilot of a ship that needs to escape from a very polluted zone in space. Many debris fly randomly around you, and you will have to dodge them and go as far as possible.

A lot of kenney's assets were used, thanks to him !

Credits :

Adlène SABA : Programming

Emeric PLASSARD : Scripting, FX and UI

Matthieu ALLAL : Production, Sounds (Research) and Scripting.

Martin DEFOSSE : Programming
